name: Boots
help: boots is a .NET global tool for <c>bootstrapping</c> <c>vsix</c> and <c>pkg</c> files.

properties.name: Stable
properties.help: Install the latest stable version of a product from VS manifests. Options include: Xamarin.Android, Xamarin.iOS, Xamarin.Mac, and Mono

properties.name: Preview
properties.help: Install the latest preview version of a product from VS manifests. Options include: Xamarin.Android, Xamarin.iOS, Xamarin.Mac, and Mono

properties.name: Url
properties.help: A Url to a <c>pkg</c> or <c>vsix</c> file to install

properties.name: FileType
properties.help: Specifies the type of file to be installed such as <c>vsix</c>, <c>pkg</c>, or <c>msi</c>. Defaults to <c>vsix</c> on Windows and <c>pkg</c> on macOS

properties.name: Timeout
properties.help: Specifies a timeout for <c>HttpClient</c>. If omitted, uses the .NET default of 100 seconds

properties.name: ReadWriteTimeout
properties.help: Specifies a timeout for reading/writing from a <c>HttpClient</c> stream. If omitted, uses a default of 300 seconds

properties.name: Retries
properties.help: Specifies a number of retries for <c>HttpClient</c> failures. If omitted, uses a default of 3 retries
